    • setPartSearchField

      public void setPartSearchField(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method initiates a search using a custom value entered by a user. Also automatically converts to lowercase to avoid case issues and will display all parts if the search field is empty
      Parameters:
      event - accepts an action when user clicks the field to set a value

    • setProductSearchField

      public void setProductSearchField(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
